title: Joel Anderson catches up on Bishop Sycamore
description:
Bomani Jones and Joel Anderson of Slate catch you up on the saga that is Bishop Sycamore, a controversial high school football team that made news in recent weeks (5:43). Bomani also takes time to gloat about winning his own charity trivia tournament on the podcast (1:30) and discusses Presbyterian College, where the head coach refuses to call for "punts" (39:04).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
